paper.title: Autoepistemic logic and introspective circumscription

author.org: University Of Texas at El Paso, El Paso, TX#TAB#
University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX
California State Polytechnic University Pomona CA

paper.venue: Theoretical Aspects of Rationality and Knowledge
paper.abstract: We investigate the relationship between two epistemic nonmonotonic formalisms: autoepistemic logic and introspective circumscription. Finitely axiomatized autoepistemic theories are shown to be equivalent to the propositional case of introspective circumscription. This theorem is applied to the problem of relating the usual "minimizing" circumscription to autoepistemic logic.
